name: Koalalorenzo's Twitch Meme Generator
description: Twitch bot that generates meme on the fly for Streamers

KTMG_CHANNEL.description: Name of the Twitch channel to monitor

KTMG_DISPLAY_TIME.description: The amount of time an image should appear

KTMG_WEBHOOK_ENABLE.description: If set to true, enables an HTTP endpoint to queue memes. Use for custom integartion or manual tests.

KTMG_WEBHOOK_USERNAME.description: (optional) Set the username for basic authentication. Leave empty to disable WebHook authentication

KTMG_WEBHOOK_PASSWORD.description: (optional) Set the password for basic authentication. Leave empty to disable WebHook authentication
